explains: adv. 仅仅，单独地，专门地；作为唯一的（消息）来源

sentences.en: Today he was able to focus his message exclusively on the economy.
sentences.cn: 今天他能够将重点聚焦在经济方面。

sentences.en: He paints from a palette consisting almost exclusively of grey and mud brown.
sentences.cn: 他画画几乎只用包含灰色和土褐色的色调。

sentences.en: Randolph's work was exclusively concerned with the effects of pollution on health.
sentences.cn: 伦道夫的作品全部讲的是污染对健康的影响。
